basics.name: Alan Josue Rios Mendoza
basics.label: Backend Developer
basics.summary: Software Development Technologist focused on backend development. Experience in building RESTful APIs using Node.js, Express, and MongoDB. Able to work in teams, adaptable, and immediately available for onsite, remote, or hybrid environments. I have contributed to backend solutions that manage real processes such as orders and client management, demonstrating the ability to solve problems with clean and scalable code.

courses: Thesis: Sales management system for Punto Frío R.T.R.

Updated records in internal systems, improving data structure management.
Systematized processes using digital tools, contributing to backend automation.

work.name: DIGIP - User Services and Support
highlights: Prepared technical documentation and reports for support and maintenance.
Diagnosed and solved system failures, enhancing backend environment knowledge.
Implemented ICT tools for internal monitoring and management processes.
